Reviews.Title: 17inch screen is great for movies
Reviews.Author: Cas Walker
Reviews.Content: I have the very similar Acer Aspire V3-731-4634 and I'm happy with it. This newer model has a slightly faster CPU. These Pentium dual-core processors are one step below the Core i3's. These don't win speed races but they're adequate like a decent 4-cylinder engine in a car.The big 17inch screen is great for movies and the keyboard & trackpad work well.Mine has better sound than most laptops: on DVD's the sound is loud and full range, not tinny like most laptop speakers.

Reviews.Title: Great 17" Win7 Laptop
Reviews.Author: Woo H. Paik
Reviews.Content: I love this laptop.  I bought it for my wife to replace a Win8 laptop that we bought recently.  Win8 is a total mess to say the least.  This one is so good that I bought another one as a backup for myself.  The Intel CPU has 2315 Passmark and it is plenty fast.  The laptop that I am currently using has Intel CPU with 1413 Passmark and is already fast enough.  The Win8 laptop has Intel Core i5 CPU with 3120 Passmark but it is not any faster and just consumes more power, so I think CPU with more than 1000 Passmark is more than fast enough for most applications.The LED backlight LCD is great, the wifi is real fast, and the battery lasts more than 4 hours.  It has HDMI, DVD-supermulti, and great style.  It is the best laptop that I ever had and I highly recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Laptop
Reviews.Author: Len
Reviews.Content: I love this computer !!  After struggling with a new windows 8 computer for a few months I decided to see if I could find a leftover windows 7 model.  this laptop fit the bill and had enough power to fit my needs.  screen resolution is very good and it is quite fast for what I do.  if you have had enough of windows 8 and can find one of these buy it !!!!

Reviews.Title: Best deal for the money! Perfect computer and easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Mark W.
Reviews.Content: I have had my New Acer 17 inch lap top for two weeks now and use it hard for many hours a day. This is one of the best lap tops I have ever owned and I have had more than 10 in my life. Most have cost over $500 more than this one. This computer is fast and easy to use. The speakers are very good and anyone can hear. One excellent computer. I would highly recommend to anyone look for a new laptop at any price.

Reviews.Title: Just about perfect except for...
Reviews.Author: L. King
Reviews.Content: I like everything about this laptop except it has one red pixel dropout almost in the center of the monitor--which means I see it a lot--and I have to prop the back up on splints to make it more ergonomic; otherwise, the edge of the computer catches my wrists just so and makes them ache after I've been typing a while. There is also an annoying built-in popup that happens every time I want to view a photo: an advertisement/nag from Microsoft, asking if I want to install Live. Despite having turned it off in programs, it STILL pops up every single time, necessitating a denial and confirmation from me before the viewer will show me the photo. This happened even after I chose to use a different picture viewer! Bad, very bad. Acer needs to vet the programs on their computers before accepting them.If it hadn't been for these few things, I'd have rated the laptop a solid 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy Has All I Need
Reviews.Author: Great Faulkner's Ghost
Reviews.Content: If you like a big  screen laptop you will love this one. The screen is bright and clear, and computer looks a lot more expensive than it is. It''s about as wide as a laptop can be and still have "lap" in the name, but it's quite light, especially for a 17 inch model. It fits easily in my Travelpro carry-on luggage too. The built in speakers sound pretty good too, although I would buy an external set if you plan to do a lot of AV activities. The processor is fast enough for me, as I use it mostly for word processing and surfing the web. I had a Toshiba Core I5 that died, and this as fast or faster to me (it has a faster HD, I believe than my Toshiba). I could do without some of the useless Acer bloatware, but I guess that's par for the course these days. Definitely feel I got a great deal from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Love this computer
Reviews.Author: Leslie Lawson
Reviews.Content: This computer is everything I wanted it to be.. Works great, fast, powerful and especially loved the Window's seven as I did not want Windows 8.

Reviews.Title: Acer laptop
Reviews.Author: Julie R. Fischer
Reviews.Content: Really good dollar value!  Love the size of the screen and of the keyboard.  Would purchase here again, for sure.

Reviews.Title: Amazing laptop
Reviews.Author: bekkah
Reviews.Content: love the big screen, the keys are not lit up, but I didn't really need them lit up with the brightness of the monitor. I was just thrilled to find a laptop that was not a windows 8. the screen on the monitor is very vibrant, makes everything clear. it moves fast enough and does everything I need it to do.

Reviews.Title: Good PC
Reviews.Author: M. Willis "Willimote"
Reviews.Content: This thing does all I want it to and more. I like the battery life and light weight. Recommend for the price.

Reviews.Title: nice replacement!
Reviews.Author: miataboss
Reviews.Content: i am very happy with my Acer laptop. It is powerful and the bigger display is great. I would recommend  this brand to any one looking for a dependable laptop.The battery doesn't last as long as I would like but that is the only draw back I've found so far.

Reviews.Title: Best laptop I had
Reviews.Author: Julia
Reviews.Content: This is the best laptop I had ever. Easy to use, light weight, fast processor. It fit my need. Really like it

Reviews.Title: Runs fine. Very heavy
Reviews.Author: Anthony Hicks
Reviews.Content: Big Screen and boots quick, but heavy! I am looking forward to lighter model in future but generally very pleased

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: TLW
Reviews.Content: My son gave me this laptop for Christmas and I love the 17 inch screen. So far I've enjoyedhaving this laptop.

Reviews.Title: Three Acer computers
Reviews.Author: Judy Brenholt
Reviews.Content: This is the third Acer I have purchased.  My first was a desktop made with acer components. The fellow who built it for me said they were the best.  I still have my second, a laptop, and it is 7 years old and still in good working condition.  My newest has met all my expectations and more.

Reviews.Title: Product is high quality and a great value.
Reviews.Author: PondDog
Reviews.Content: This is my personal computer.  The most intensive activity I subject the computer to is the streaming of movies with some concurrent  web surfing.  This computer is able to keep up and it has great video and sound.  I am very happy with the product and the price makes this a great value.  Add to all of this Windows 7 and not being part of Microsoft's QA effort for Windows 8 is just the cream and the cherry on top.Very happy customer!

Reviews.Title: Quality laptop at an affordable price .
Reviews.Author: Thom Lawson
Reviews.Content: I like the layout of the keys with a number pad. I like the larger screen. It is pleasure to use.

Reviews.Title: Amazon wins again
Reviews.Author: john kania
Reviews.Content: Was shopping in all the stores for an acer and they were overpriced then I checked out amazon and they had the sweet deal, I bought it and it was at my house in 2 days.

Reviews.Title: Great computer
Reviews.Author: alexis dabroski
Reviews.Content: I love this laptop. Great value. No complaints? Glad I have windows 7 again and avoided getting stuck with windows 8

Reviews.Title: key errors
Reviews.Author: Ralph Hoffmann
Reviews.Content: At least 5 lower case keys add a character before or after and some upper case keys won't print at all.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Intel_Pentium_Dual_Core_2020M 2.4 GHz
4 GB DDR3
500 GB 7200 rpm Hard Drive
17.3-Inch Screen
Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit
ProductInfo.Name: Acer Aspire V3-731-4439 17-Inch Laptop (2.4 Ghz Intel Pentium 2020M Processor, 4GB RAM, 500GB Hard Drive, Windows 7 Home Premium)
